# Advanced LaTeX Tutorial

This tutorial explores advanced LaTeX features including:
- Custom commands and environments.
- Package management.
- Creating custom templates.

## Custom Command Example

You can define a new command in LaTeX as follows:

```latex
\newcommand{\R}{\mathbb{R}}
```
Now, you can use $\R$ to denote the set of real numbers.
